title: Five Nights at Freddy's
description: Survive five nights as a security guard at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. A classic horror survival game.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2
description: The sequel to the hit horror game. New animatronics, new mechanics, and new terrors await.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's 3
description: 30 years after Freddy Fazbear's closed, a horror attraction opens. Only one animatronic remains.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's 4
description: The final chapter. This time, the nightmares come to your bedroom.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's 4: Halloween Edition
description: The Halloween update to FNAF 4 with new challenges and even more scares.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location
description: Deep below ground, a new facility holds darker secrets. Can you survive the sister location?

title: Five Nights at Freddy's: Pizzeria Simulator
description: Design your own pizzeria by day, survive the horrors by night in this business simulation.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's: Ultimate Custom Night
description: Customize your nightmare with 50+ characters. Create the ultimate FNAF challenge.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's World
description: A colorful RPG adventure featuring your favorite FNAF characters in a cute, friendly world.

title: Amanda the Adventurer
description: A horror puzzle game about a mysterious children's TV show with dark secrets.

title: Andy's Apple Farm
description: A seemingly innocent farm game that takes a dark turn. Help Andy with his apple farm.

title: Bendy and the Ink Machine
description: A survival horror game set in a twisted cartoon animation studio.

title: Bergen Truck
description: Drive a powerful truck through challenging terrain and obstacles.
controls: Arrow keys or WASD to drive

title: Blood Money
description: An intense action game with stealth and strategy elements.

title: Buckshot Roulette
description: A tense psychological horror game based on Russian roulette with a shotgun.

title: Class of '09
description: A dark comedy visual novel about high school life with mature themes.

title: Deltarune
description: The spiritual successor to Undertale. A story-driven RPG with unique combat mechanics.

title: Do NOT Take This Cat Home
description: A quirky horror game about a suspicious cat with mysterious intentions.

title: Happy Sheepies
description: A cute puzzle game about guiding sheep to safety through various challenges.

title: Hotline Miami
description: A fast-paced top-down action game with neon aesthetics and intense combat.

title: Kindergarten
description: A dark comedy adventure game set in a twisted kindergarten with sinister secrets.

title: Milkman Karlson
description: A fast-paced parkour FPS game where you play as a milkman with incredible abilities.
controls: WASD to move, Mouse to look and shoot

title: OMORI
description: A psychological horror RPG about a boy named Sunny and his mysterious alter-ego Omori.

title: People Playground
description: A physics sandbox game where you can experiment with ragdoll characters.

title: Pizza Tower
description: A fast-paced 2D platformer inspired by Wario Land with pizza-themed madness.

title: R.E.P.O
description: A dark action game with horror elements and intense gameplay mechanics.

title: Slender: The 8 Pages
description: The classic horror game where you must collect 8 pages while avoiding the Slender Man.
controls: WASD to move, Mouse to look, F for flashlight

title: Speed Stars
description: A high-speed racing game with stellar graphics and exciting tracks.
controls: Arrow keys or WASD to drive

title: That's Not My Neighbor
description: A suspenseful horror game about identifying imposters among your neighbors.

title: ULTRAKILL
description: A fast-paced ultra-violent retro FPS that combines the skill-based style of classic shooters.
controls: WASD to move, Mouse to look and shoot

title: Undertale
description: A story-driven RPG with innovative combat mechanics where you don't have to destroy anyone.

title: Undertale Yellow
description: A fan-made prequel to Undertale featuring a human with a yellow soul.

title: Web Fishing
description: A relaxing multiplayer fishing game where you can chat and catch fish with friends.

title: Yume Nikki
description: A surreal exploration game about a girl who explores her dreams in a mysterious world.
controls: Arrow keys to move, Z to interact

title: Kindergarten
description: A darkly comedic adventure game where you navigate the mysterious world of kindergarten and uncover its secrets.

title: Kindergarten 2
description: The sequel to Kindergarten with new mysteries, characters, and dark humor in a school setting.

title: People Playground
description: A physics sandbox game where you can experiment with ragdoll characters and various interactive elements.

title: Bendy and the Ink Machine
description: A first-person survival horror game featuring vintage cartoon aesthetics and a haunting storyline.
controls: WASD to move, mouse to look around and interact

title: 1v1.LOL
description: A competitive online third-person shooter where you battle opponents and build structures.
controls: WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot, build controls

title: Doge Miner
description: Help Doge and his crew mine on the moon! Click to mine dogecoins and upgrade your mining operation.

title: Slope
description: A fast-paced 3D running game where you control a ball rolling down a slope with increasing speed.
controls: A/D or Left/Right arrows to steer

title: Subway Surfers
description: An endless runner game where you surf the subways and dodge the grumpy inspector and his dog.
controls: Arrow keys to move, Space to jump

title: Drift Hunters
description: A free-to-play 3D drifting game with an excellent selection of tracks and plenty of tuned-up cars.
controls: WASD or arrow keys to drive, Space for handbrake

title: Smash Karts
description: A fun 3D multiplayer kart battle game full of real-time action.
controls: WASD to move, Space to use items

title: Among Us
description: A social deduction game where crewmates work together to complete tasks while identifying impostors.
controls: WASD to move, Mouse to interact and vote

title: Basket Bros
description: A fun basketball game where you play 1-on-1 matches with various characters and power-ups.
controls: Arrow keys to move, Space to shoot/pass

title: Basketball Stars
description: A competitive basketball game featuring legendary players and intense matches.
controls: WASD to move, X to shoot, Z to super shot

title: Cookie Clicker
description: The classic incremental game where you click cookies to build a massive cookie empire.
controls: Mouse to click and purchase upgrades

title: Baldi's Basics
description: A horror/comedy educational game where you solve math problems while avoiding Baldi in his schoolhouse.
controls: WASD to move, Mouse to interact, Shift to run

title: BitLife
description: A life simulation game where you make choices to live different virtual lives from birth to death.
controls: Mouse to make choices and navigate menus

title: Stickman Hook
description: A physics-based game where you swing through levels using your grappling hook like Spider-Man.
controls: Click and hold to swing, release to let go
